original_title: Os Amantes Ou Da Incomum Arte de Se Achar Sem Se Perder
overview: Two men hook up for a one night stand of hot sex. In the morning one is gone, and so is some of the other's cash. After a repeat performance, more cash is missing. Should there be a third round?
title: Os Amantes Ou Da Incomum Arte de Se Achar Sem Se Perder
